name: DON'T DIE - The elevator
description:
In DON'T DIE, you're in a broken elevator, and you have to find a way to die.

How to play:

Use WASD to move, the mouse for looking around,
right mouse for grabing objects and the left mouse for throwing objects.

Development:

This is our first gamejam and that's what we've finished with.

At the beginning, the objective of the game was to find a funny way to die in multiple level.

Sadly, our inexeprience and our overambitious ideas made us lost a lot of time...

Only the tutorial level made the cut.

Hope you have fun, please give us feedback
